headline: DO IT!!! Jim Jordan says GOP should IMPEACH Biden after taking the House BACK in November
author: Fred T
sentences:
“You have to have complete buy-in from the entire conference and the leadership of our conference.”
And:
Republicans would be turning the tables on Democrats if they launch impeachment proceedings against Mr. Biden.

“The president of the United States is supposed to enforce the laws along the border and they’re not doing it.”
It’s just one of the many reasons the GOP should seriously consider impeachment of Biden.
He said the GOP should weigh impeaching Mr. Biden for failures in office, most notably his administration’s inability to stop a massive influx of illegal immigration through the southern border.
He’s more than earned an impeachment, even on the old standards that existed BEFORE Democrats destroyed the necessity of having a reason to impeach.
The first impeachment, in 2019, charged him with corruption over his attempt to get Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to investigate the Bidens.
“I think that’s definitely a discussion we have to have,” Mr. Jordan told The Washington Times at a Republican planning retreat in North Florida.
But the lawmaker said the decision to try to remove the 79-year-old president from office would have to be agreed upon by every House Republican.
Jordan says it’s “definitely a discussion we have to have,” but if you ask ol’ Fred they should go ahead and commit to it.
Democrats impeached Mr. Trump a second time after the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the Capitol, which they said he incited.
Mr. Jordan said the illegal immigration surge is “one of the issues” that makes Mr. Biden a target for impeachment.
In both impeachment trials, the Senate failed to garner the two-thirds majority needed to convict Mr. Trump.
Not that there is any reason to need a reason anymore thanks to the Democrats.
And Ted Cruz is being too careful too, as they talk about in the article.
“Just look at the border,” Jim Jordan tells the Washington Times.
The Democratic-controlled House twice impeached President Trump.
Ten Republicans also voted to impeach Mr. Trump in 2021.
Here’s more on Jordan’s take from the Washington Times.
Mr. Jordan’s committee would lead an impeachment trial.
The man has made his own case for being impeached.
“The conference has to decide,” Mr. Jordan said.
He’s right, but not right ENOUGH.
